title: Karthus VO bugged
body: Karthus voice is currently bugged is that just for me ? bec all other champs are fine already tryed to repair it and reinstall both not successful. you cant hear any of his lines you can hear the sounds he is doing when he open his book or scream in his statue of karthus skin but otherwise silence

replies.body: We're aware of this issue and are working on a fix! ^-^

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=kKs6XExp,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-02-02T18:22:56.841+0000)
>
> We're aware of this issue and are working on a fix! ^-^

Are you guys also aware the Elise's spider VO is missing as well?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=kKs6XExp,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-02-02T18:33:21.609+0000)
>
> Yes! :]

oh ty cant play my fave death singer without his vocals :D
It's not just you man, I have the same problem. I hope Riot fixes this :)
